title: This is a TinyMCE test.
content:
Line 1.

Line 2.

Bold. Italic. 

Center align. 

Right align.

Seems to work.

title: Change ideas:
content:
Write some javascript stuff to do the JSON decoding and post-putting, instead of having the php do it.
MAKE THE CLIENT WORK MOAR!

title: Todo list:
content:
Make it so that the page will break and form a page 2 after a certain amount of posts.
Add some javascript to the text editor so that it can do more stuff.
Or, use the TinyMCE thing.
Maybe make the text editor use markdown.
Maybe some other stuff too. I don't know.
Make it so that mousing over posts on the main page in admin mode overlays a transparent div over them with "edit" and "delete" buttons.
Make posts deletable.
Add a "success" message to the edit page on form submit.
Add pretty CSS animations.
And moar!
